{"id":996325557,"question_id":2891,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"11Â months","timestamp":1689562869,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"43 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/996325557/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Beauty of an Array After Applying Operation","memory":"58.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maximumBeauty(int[] nums, int k) {\n        \n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        \n        int max = 0;\n        \n        int j=0;\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.length; i++){\n            \n            if(nums[i]-nums[j]>2*k){\n                j++;\n            }\n            \n            max = Math.max(max, i-j+1);\n            \n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        return max;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-beauty-of-an-array-after-applying-operation","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
